channel.title: Minetest on Sudarshana A
channel.description: Recent content in Minetest on Sudarshana A

item.title: MINETEST Game
item.description: Minetest is similar to Minecraft. I want to install Minecarft for Linux and did some research. Accidentally I found out about the Minetest, an open source game similar to Minecraft. I have installed it to my laptop running Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS. Tutorial for Minetest beginers can be found here.
